"The Class Counter":
"The Class Counter's \"Change Class\" function lets you change your Class (aka job).

You can use the \"My Set\" system to register a combination of Classes, weapons, armor etc as a set, which you can switch to easily at any time."

"The \"Learn Class Skills\" function allows you to learn Class Skills by assigning the required number of Skill Points to them.

※Skill Points can be reassigned an unlimited number of times.
※Class Skills indicated with \"SP 0\" can be learned without assigning any Skill Points to them."
